title: Changing Your My Eyes Only Passcode (Even If You Forgot It)

steps.title: Open Snapchat.
steps.content: Open Snapchat. The app will have a ghost icon with a yellow background. By default, your camera will be open. If needed you can download the Snapchat app or create an account .

steps.title: Navigate to your Memories.
steps.content: Navigate to your Memories. This can be found to the left of the record button, indicated by the icon of two overlapping rectangles. This is where you'll be able to manage and delete Snaps .

steps.title: Tap the My Eyes Only tab.
steps.content: Tap the My Eyes Only tab. This will be located underneath the search bar, next to Screenshots . [1] X Research source My Eyes Only can offer you privacy needed to stay safe on Snapchat .

steps.title: Tap Options in the bottom right corner.
steps.content: Tap Options in the bottom right corner. A new window will pop up with Change Passcode , Forgot Passcode , and Cancel . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Change Passcode.
steps.content: Tap Change Passcode . You will be prompted to enter your current passcode. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your current passcode.
steps.content: Enter your current passcode. A new screen will open.

steps.title: Create a new passcode.
steps.content: Create a new passcode. Enter a new 4-digit passcode for My Eyes Only . Alternatively, you can click Use Passphrase on the bottom to use a passphrase. Passphrases must be at least 16 characters long and have at least one letter and one number.

steps.title: Confirm new passcode.
steps.content: Confirm new passcode. Enter the same passcode or passphrase to confirm it.

steps.title: Agree to the terms and click Continue.
steps.content: Agree to the terms and click Continue . You will need to tap the circle beside Snapchat's terms: I understand that if I forget this passcode, Snapchat won't be able to recover my passcode or my Snaps in My Eyes Only. [4] X Research source Your new passcode will be displayed on the screen until you continue.

steps.title: Tap Finish.
steps.content: Tap Finish . Your passcode is now changed. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Open Snapchat.
steps.content: Open Snapchat. The app will have a ghost icon with a yellow background. By default, your camera will be open. Only use this method as a last resort to use the feature again. Existing Snaps in My Eyes Only will be deleted with no way to recover them.

steps.title: Navigate to your Memories.
steps.content: Navigate to your Memories. This can be found to the left of the record button, indicated by the icon of two overlapping rectangles. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the My Eyes Only tab.
steps.content: Tap the My Eyes Only tab. This will be located underneath the search bar, next to Screenshots . [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Options in the bottom right corner.
steps.content: Tap Options in the bottom right corner. A new window will pop up with Change Passcode , Forgot Passcode , and Cancel .

steps.title: Tap Forgot Passcode.
steps.content: Tap Forgot Passcode . You will be prompted to enter your Snapchat password. This is the password you use to log into your Snapchat account. [8] X Research source If you don't remember your password, you'll need to reset your password .

steps.title: Enter your Snapchat account password.
steps.content: Enter your Snapchat account password. This is different from your My Eyes Only passcode. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next .

steps.title: Agree to the terms and click Continue.
steps.content: Agree to the terms and click Continue . You will need to tap the circle beside Snapchat's terms: I understand that creating a new passcode will delete all Snaps in My Eyes Only. When you forget your passcode, you will lose all Snaps currently saved to My Eyes Only .

steps.title: Create a new passcode.
steps.content: Create a new passcode. Enter a new 4-digit passcode for My Eyes Only . Alternatively, you can click Use Passphrase on the bottom to use a passphrase. Passphrases must be at least 16 characters long and have at least one letter and one number.

steps.title: Confirm new passcode.
steps.content: Confirm new passcode. Enter the same passcode or passphrase to confirm it. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Agree to the terms and click Continue.
steps.content: Agree to the terms and click Continue . You will need to tap the circle beside Snapchat's terms: I understand that if I forget this passcode, Snapchat won't be able to recover my passcode or my Snaps in My Eyes Only. Your new passcode will be displayed on the screen until you continue.

steps.title: Tap Finish.
steps.content: Tap Finish . Your passcode is now changed.
